name: Alien vs Predator: The Last of His Clan
overview: You are the Predator! You're the last of a clan that's been decimated by an overwhelming number of savage aliens. Their numbers and ferocity can only mean one thing - they're defending an alien queen! Defend your honor! Defend your clan's honor! Hunt the queen and take revenge. Use your awesome Predator weaponry: laser cannons, wristblades, cutting disk, bombs and cloaking device as you fight your way through hordes of vicious alien hordes,face-huggers and chest-bursters on 7 maze-like levels in your quest for the ultimate trophy: the alien queen!
